original_text: In all the cities in each region of the kingdom where the Jews lived, they joined together. They punished anyone who tried to hurt them. Nobody could fight against them because all the people were very afraid of them.
korean_text: 유다인들이 아하수에로 왕의 각 지방, 각 읍에 모여 자기들을 해하고자 한 자를 죽이려 하니 모든 민족이 그들을 두려워하여 능히 막을 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: In all the cities in each region of the kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 왕국의 각 지역에 있는 모든 도시에서

sentences.original_text: They punished anyone who tried to hurt them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 해치려고 한 사람들을 벌했습니다

sentences.original_text: because all the people were very afraid of them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 그들을 매우 두려워했기 때문입니다
